H

HttpClient - Interface in nl.idgis.geoide.commons.http.client
Generic HTTP client interface.
HttpRequest - Interface in nl.idgis.geoide.commons.http.client
The HttpRequest interface describes the parameters for a request that is to be peformed on HttpClient.
HttpRequest.Method - Enum in nl.idgis.geoide.commons.http.client
Enum containing all supported HTTP request methods.
HttpRequestBuilder - Interface in nl.idgis.geoide.commons.http.client
Provides a fluent interface for configuring HTTP request.
HttpResponse - Interface in nl.idgis.geoide.commons.http.client
Describes the response of executing a HttpRequest using an HttpClient.
